definition: name of "speech" or "words" radical in Chinese characters (Kangxi radical 149)/see also 訁|讠[yan2]
words/speech/to say/to talk
letter/symbol/character/word/CL:個|个[ge4]/courtesy or style name traditionally given to males aged 20 in dynastic China
one side/other/different/lateral component of a Chinese character (such as 刂[dao1], 亻[ren2] etc)
(colloquial) grapheme 攵 (variant form of Kangxi radical 66, 攴)
name of "ice" radical in Chinese characters (Kangxi radical 15)/see also 冫[bing1]
name of "water" radical in Chinese characters (Kangxi radical 85)/see also 氵[shui3]
component of a Chinese character (as the radical or the phonetic part)
"speech" or "words" radical in Chinese characters (Kangxi radical 149)/see also 言字旁[yan2 zi4 pang2]
name of "cover" radical in Chinese characters (Kangxi radical 14)/see also 冖[mi4]
to walk (side part of split character)
semantic component of a phono-semantic character (e.g. component刂[dao1] in 刻[ke4])
name of "tiger" radical in Chinese characters (Kangxi radical 141)/see also 虍[hu1]
radical of a Chinese character
fourth tone in Mandarin/falling tone
pig snout (Kangxi radical 58)
name of the lateral "knife" radical 刂[dao1] in Chinese characters (Kangxi radical 18), occurring in 到[dao4], 利[li4], 別|别[bie2] etc
"lid" radical in Chinese characters (Kangxi radical 8)
original form of a Chinese character
phonetic component of Chinese character
